TopicTitle: How do i remove the smooth timewarp

Articles.Content:
if you dont know when you use timewarp in ksp 2, it goes smoothly instead of snapping, i would like to get that removed as, 1. i miss transfer windows and 2. IS LAG
if you have a mod/know how to remove this i would be eternally grateful
Im not sure this is something you can get rid of. It seems like they put it in the game for a reason but im not a modder so IDK for sure. Probably to do with the physics warp.
They need to remove this! It makes the game incredibly hard to play as you never know what mode of time warp you are in and you can’t exit it immediately.

39 minutes ago, BeastHunter said:

They need to remove this! It makes the game incredibly hard to play as you never know what mode of time warp you are in and you can’t exit it immediately.

yes! i lost so many encounters due to this feature! @Nate Simpson, remove this please

Even in KSP1  time warp didn't stop immediately, but yes it 'fades out' slower in KSP2. 

My guess it it's to 'ease in' the new level without a sudden stop that could cause issues.

I always keep an eye out and reduce warp when I'm getting close.  If you hover over the warp arrows it shows the speed as a pop-up.
